name: Caramel-Apple Crisp
author: Kinza
summary: Yummy warm apple dessert. If desired, serve with whipped cream and additional caramel topping.
ingredients: 6 large baking apples, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices
½ cup cold butter, cut into small pieces
directions: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Stir the caramel topping and cinnamon together in a bowl
Toss in the apples, mixing until evenly coated
Spread apple mixture into an 8-inch square baking dish
Mix flour and brown sugar into the same bowl used to mix the apples
Cut in the butter with a knife or pastry blender until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Stir in the oats, then crumble over the apples
Bake in the preheated oven until the apples are tender and the topping is golden brown, 45 to 50 minutes
